description: This file defines the NoteRepository class, which manages data operations for Note objects, interfacing with the database via NoteDao. It provides methods for retrieving all notes, retrieving a note by ID, searching notes, and performing insert, update, and delete operations asynchronously.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class that provides an API for data operations related to notes, handling database interactions asynchronously.

methods.name: NoteRepository
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the NoteRepository with the application context, setting up database access via NoteDao.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes from the database.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Returns a LiveData object for the note identified by the given ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Performs a search query for notes matching the provided string.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database asynchronously.
